title: News from nowhere
creator_credit: Alister Hallum and Alister Hallum Productions
brief_description: Describes the life and works of the English poet, artist, printer and socialist, William Morris. Cast includes: Timothy West, Kika Markham, John Cater and Clive Swift.
description: Describes the life and works of the English poet, artist, printer and socialist, William Morris. Cast includes: Timothy West, Kika Markham, John Cater and Clive Swift.
